data.name: Thunder Ray
data.detailed_description:
The most powerful boxer on Earth was kidnapped by the Galactic Boxing Federation to play in the wildest tournament in the Universe. Tired of having no match on earth, Thunder accepts this challenge to become the truly GOAT!





FEATURES:
- Enjoy 2D wonderful Handme Animations
- Defeat 12 Unique and bloody Contenders
- Master Thunder special attacks
- Rule the Arcade dynamic boxing
- Travel across 6 Wild Galactic Stages
- Become a Champion of the Universe
- Learn to defeat the most brutal technics
- Be bloody and wild!
data.about_the_game:
The most powerful boxer on Earth was kidnapped by the Galactic Boxing Federation to play in the wildest tournament in the Universe. Tired of having no match on earth, Thunder accepts this challenge to become the truly GOAT!

data.short_description: Thunder Ray is Arcade-Boxing, Retro-like gameplay with blood and violence. Defeat all the best fighters in the galaxy to become the GOAT of the universe.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
